title: Artificial intelligence to control traffic congestion in Rajasthan's Udaipur

content:

title: The political economy of artificial intelligence
description: The central question is no longer whether artificial intelligence will reshape our economy, but who will benefit from that transformation.
content: Consider the architecture of today’s AI systems. The models are data-hungry and compute-intensive, and both inputs are increasingly controlled by a handful of firms. Training a frontier model requires not just talent, but access to thousands of speci... [3254 chars]

title: Prawn farmers in Kodungalloor struggle as prices drop
description: Prawn farming in Kodungalloor faces a severe crisis due to drastically dropping prices..prawn farming Kodungalloor, Kerala prawn farmers crisis, prawn prices drop India, vanami prawn market, Kara prawn farming, aquaculture Kerala, Indian fisheries tariff war, fish farm subsidies Kerala, prawn farming challenges, sustainable aquaculture practices, climate change impact on prawn farms, LLM analysis of prawn market trends, artificial intelligence for prawn farming, best prawn farming practices, support for Kerala prawn farmers

title: First batch graduate from school of Data Science and AI of IIT-Guwahati
description: Guwahati, Oct 10 (PTI) The first batch of students from school of Data Science and AI in IIT-Guwahati has graduated, with over 90 per cent of the students securing offers from leading companies through campus recruitment. The Mehta Family School of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence (MFSDS&AI) at IIT-Guwahati was launched in 2001, with the […]

title: India Gears Up for Sovereign AI Model, Targets AI Summit 2026 Debut
description: India aims to launch its sovereign artificial intelligence model before the AI Impact Summit in February 2026. The Ministry of Electronics and IT has rapidly expanded its GPU infrastructure to build foundational models. The government is focusing on sector-specific AI applications to enhance productivity.

title: AI Will Kill Gold, But Bitcoin Comes out Stronger, Predicts Nick Szabo
description: Nick Szabo believes artificial intelligence will destroy gold, but it is a win for Bitcoin
content:
